upcomingEvents.title: E-Summit 2025
upcomingEvents.description: The biggest entrepreneurship summit of the year featuring renowned speakers, startup showcases, and networking opportunities.
upcomingEvents.longDescription: Join us for the most anticipated entrepreneurship event of 2025! E-Summit brings together industry leaders, successful entrepreneurs, investors, and aspiring founders under one roof. Experience inspiring keynotes, interactive panel discussions, startup pitch competitions, and extensive networking opportunities.

upcomingEvents.title: SnackChat
upcomingEvents.description: Casual networking session with snacks and drinks, connecting students with industry professionals.
upcomingEvents.longDescription: Join us for an informal networking session where you can connect with fellow entrepreneurs, industry experts, and E-Cell members over snacks and refreshments. Perfect opportunity to build relationships, share ideas, and learn about exciting opportunities in the startup ecosystem.

upcomingEvents.title: Web Development Workshop Series
upcomingEvents.description: Comprehensive web development workshop series covering modern frameworks and best practices.
upcomingEvents.longDescription: Master modern web development through our intensive workshop series. Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, and deployment strategies. Each session builds on the previous one, taking you from beginner to building production-ready web applications.

upcomingEvents.title: Innovation Hackathon 2025
upcomingEvents.description: 48-hour hackathon challenging participants to build innovative solutions for real-world problems.
upcomingEvents.longDescription: Put your coding skills to the test in our flagship hackathon! Teams will have 48 hours to ideate, design, and develop innovative solutions addressing current challenges in technology, sustainability, healthcare, or education. Win exciting prizes and get mentorship from industry experts.

upcomingEvents.title: Intra E-Cell Mentorship Session
upcomingEvents.description: Internal mentorship program connecting experienced E-Cell members with newcomers.
upcomingEvents.longDescription: Our Intra E-Cell mentorship program pairs experienced members with newcomers to share knowledge, provide guidance, and help build the next generation of E-Cell leaders. Learn about event management, team coordination, and entrepreneurial skills from those who've been through the journey.

workshops.title: Lean Startup Methodology Workshop
workshops.description: Hands-on workshop on building products using lean startup principles and MVP development.
workshops.longDescription: Learn the proven methodology that has helped thousands of startups build successful products. This interactive workshop covers the Build-Measure-Learn cycle, customer development, and rapid prototyping techniques that minimize risk and maximize learning.
workshops.instructorBio: Serial entrepreneur and startup mentor with 3 successful exits

workshops.title: Digital Marketing for Startups
workshops.description: Comprehensive guide to digital marketing strategies specifically tailored for early-stage startups.
workshops.longDescription: Discover cost-effective digital marketing strategies that startups can implement with limited budgets. Cover social media marketing, content strategy, SEO basics, email marketing, and growth hacking techniques that have proven successful for early-stage companies.
workshops.instructorBio: Growth Marketing Expert with 8+ years helping startups scale

workshops.title: Startup Funding & Investment Basics
workshops.description: Understanding different funding stages, investor expectations, and term sheet negotiations.
workshops.longDescription: Navigate the complex world of startup funding with confidence. This workshop breaks down different funding stages, from bootstrapping to Series A and beyond. Learn what investors look for, how to prepare for funding rounds, and understand key terms in investment agreements.
workshops.instructorBio: Former VC Partner, currently mentoring 20+ startups

completedEvents.title: E-Summit 2024
completedEvents.description: Our flagship entrepreneurship summit featuring 15+ speakers and 500+ attendees.
highlights: Startup Pitch Competition with ₹2L prize pool

completedEvents.title: AI Innovation Challenge 2024
completedEvents.description: 36-hour AI hackathon with focus on solving real-world problems using artificial intelligence.
highlights: Winners developed an AI-powered healthcare solution

completedEvents.title: Founders Meetup Q4 2024
completedEvents.description: Casual networking session bringing together student entrepreneurs and industry founders.
highlights: Panel discussion on 'Failing Fast and Learning Faster'
